scripts.build: npm run typecheck && npm run build:web
scripts.cargo:check: cd src-tauri && cargo check --lib && cargo check --bin celechron
scripts.check: npm run build && npm run check:colors && npm run cargo:check
scripts.release:mac: npm run release:sync-version && npm run tauri build
scripts.release:android: npm run release:sync-version && npm run tauri android build --apk --aab
scripts.release:ios: npm run release:sync-version && npm run tauri ios build
scripts.release:all: npm run release:mac && npm run release:android && npm run release:ios
